text: Connect your MetaMask. Choose the network your NFT token contract is deployed to.
Select the NFT token standard you want to send. We currently support both of the most popular standards: ERC-721 and ERC-1155.
Enter your token address in NFT contract address field. Approve NFT Easy Drop to use your tokens.

Enter manually or upload an csv/txt file containing the list of recipients with corresponding token IDs separated by comma. ONE ADDRESS PER ROW. In case you are dropping ERC-1155 tokens with the same ID to all the recipients, you can choose single ID mode and provide ID in the separate field.
Click the Validate input button to have our app check that the data you entered is correct. Invalid rows will be removed from the input field.
Click Send button and confirm the transaction. It usually takes up to 5 minutes for transaction to be mined.
